meanings.definition: In a way that relates to the structure or arrangement of an organization.
meanings.sent1: The team worked organizationally to plan the event efficiently.
meanings.sent2: She manages the office organizationally, ensuring everything is in its place.
meanings.sent3: The penguins organizationally arranged themselves by height for the group photo.
meanings.sent4: The ants moved organizationally, forming a perfect line to their anthill.
meanings.sent5: The books on the shelf were organizationally arranged by genre, making it easy to find a specific one.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the coordination or management of tasks within an organization.
meanings.sent1: The supervisor organizationally assigned roles to each team member for the project.
meanings.sent2: He communicates organizationally to ensure everyone is on the same page.
meanings.sent3: The robots organizationally completed their tasks, impressing their human creators.
meanings.sent4: The traffic flowed organizationally, guided by the traffic lights.
meanings.sent5: The chef organizationally prepared the ingredients before starting to cook, saving time in the kitchen.
